key.name: buttons
key.summary: List of buttons to display in the system menu
key.description: A list of buttons to display in the system menu. Possible values are 'prefs', 'logs', 'restart', 'nested', and 'lg'.

key.name: items-layout
key.summary: How the extension should display the items
key.description: If true, the extension will display the items as icon-buttons intead of labeled menu-items.

key.name: use-sudo
key.summary: If the extension should use sudo
key.description: If true, the extension will use sudo instead of pkexec to get the administrative privileges (needed to see logs).

key.name: term-prefix
key.description: For example 'gnome-terminal --' or 'tilix -e' Let empty for using the system default terminal.
